title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. Quick and comforting.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery, & creamy tomato-based gravy. Serve with naan.

title: Vegan Lentil Soup
summary: Hearty and nutritious soup made with red lentils, carrots, celery, and a blend of Mediterranean spices. Great for cold weather.

title: Ultimate Beef Burgers
summary: Juicy beef patties seasoned perfectly and served on toasted buns with all your favorite toppings. A summer BBQ staple.

title: Lemon Drizzle Cake
summary: A light, moist sponge cake infused with a zesty lemon syrup. Perfect for afternoon tea or dessert.

title: Spicy Tuna Rolls
summary: Fresh tuna mixed with a creamy, spicy mayo sauce, rolled inside rice and seaweed. Simple and delicious homemade sushi.
